sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  a  total  of  21  people  have  been  killed  and  64  injured  in  a  strike  on  a  displaced  persons  camp  in  west  Rafah  this  afternoon.
It  comes  after  at  least  45  Palestinians  were  killed  in  an  Israeli  air  strike  in  Rafah  on  Sunday.
